title: Employee Capacity Report
subTitle: This is a subtitle
description: I developed an automated scheduler for generating employee capacity reports, which streamlines the process of tracking and managing employee time records. This system automatically emails all employees who log their hours, ensuring they receive timely reminders and updates regarding their capacity and workload. By implementing this solution, I enhanced communication within the organisation and improved the accuracy of capacity tracking, enabling better resource allocation and workload management.

skills: Programming: Java, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, MySQL
Cloud Services: AWS Elastic Beanstalk, Azure Entra ID
Other: Agile Methodology, SOLID principles, MVC pattern
jd: Developed the solution to focus on employee capacity based on working days, excluding weekends, holidays, and day-offs, and deployed it to AWS.
Conducted unit testing and integration testing.
